education.details: Thesis Project: “Segmentation of subscribers by traffic consumption in prepaid lines of Telefonica using k-means multivariate cluster analysis”. Top student, outstanding grade.
Thesis Project: “Application of non-operational troubleshooting of Telefonica and its sales channels”. Outstanding grade.

education.degree: Diploma Data Leadership & Leveraging Data Systems
education.details: Participated in an immersive program with leaders in data management at the MIT Executive Program.
